short_summary: Service requirement for remote simultaneous interpretation.
description: The Canada School of Public Service has a requirement for remote simultaneous interpretation services for upcoming events. The contract will last for one year and can be extended by two optional extensions.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
### Remote Simultaneous Interpretation (RSI) Tender Announcement

**Canada School of Public Service (CSPS)**
**Request for Proposal (RFP) - RSI Services**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01007207 (PW-2022-10-07207)
**Amendment Number:** 9
**Solicitation Number:** CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296/A
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-14
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-25, 14:00:00 Eastern Time (ET)

**Request Overview:**
The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) invites proposals for Remote Simultaneous Interpretation (RSI) services for upcoming events organized by CSPS, on an as-needed basis. This RFP aims to award up to two (2) contracts, each with an initial period of one (1) year, with the possibility of two (2) one-year extensions.

**Budget Allocation:**
The total allocated budget for this requirement, including the two option years, is CAD $450,000.00, excluding applicable taxes. The initial contract is allocated CAD $250,000.00, and each option year is allocated CAD $100,000.00.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other trade agreements listed below:

*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Submission Requirements:**
Interested suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through [Buyer's website, usually Bid Group].

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity for this procurement is the Canada School of Public Service (CSPS).

**Attachments:**
A list of related documents is provided below:

*   CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296
